DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 study conduct 10 center enroll patient August 2013 August 2017.Firstly , All patient include provide write informed consent . Secondly , randomize equally receive modify VCD regimen arm 1 modified VCD regimen arm 2 . In total , 47 patient per arm ( 94 total ) require . The treatment consist four 4-week cycle induction therapy follow intensive therapy another five modify VCD regimens maintenance treatment CP regimen . Then , patient follow 24 month chemotherapy . The investigator record laboratory clinical investigation assess response different point study . We also monitor assess adverse event ( AEs ) , grade accord NCI-CTCAE Version 3.0.Response category base International Myeloma Working Group uniform response criteria.In addition , 20 patient ( 10 VCD regimen arm 1 group , 10 VCD regimen arm 2 group ) ten centre enrol pharmacodynamic substudy .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability Efficacy Modified VCD Regimens Previously Untreated Multiple Myeloma .
DOC.criteria: Patients previously untreated symptomatic MM 18 year age old , regardless gender secretory MM measurable disease Karnofsky Performance Status≥50 % （pathological fracture excluded） Patients without heart pulmonary dysfunction ≤class I peripheral neuropathy grade 2 high accord NCICTCAE Version 3.0 Relapse refractory MM MM without symptom Nonsecretory MM without measurable disease Karnofsky Performance Status＜50 % （pathological fracture excluded） Patients heart pulmonary dysfunction > class I
